job.title: Marketing Analyst
job.description: ltpgtThis role will support the execution and growth of Vrooms productfeed based acquisition channels orchestrating a mix of proprietary and third party toolsampnbsp This role is integral to the team and the company as many of Vrooms largest partnerships depend on productfeeds and thirdparty site merchandising This position will work across a spectrum of external partners and internal stakeholders including product data brand marketing digital marketing and supplyltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtResponsibilitiesltpgtltulgtltligtEnsure high visibility for Vrooms inventory across a broad spectrum of acquisition channels via management over a suite of datafeed oriented toolsltligtltligtCreate deploy and measure feedbased optimization testsltligtltligtMonitor dashboards tracking product feed healthltligtltligtProject manage copy and creative implementation through the spectrum of external partnersltligtltligtSupport partnership development onboarding and adhoc marketing analysis through research data collection and data validationltligtltligtCreate manage and deploy website UTM tracking codes and phone numbers across the marketing organizationltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtRequirementsltpgtltulgtltligtDemonstrated strength in deductive reasoning logic numbers and problemsolving skillsltligtltligtHighly sophisticated communication skills oral and writtenltligtltligtPositive attitude and presentable demeanor with an ability to work collaboratively in a rapidly changing environmentltligtltligtStrong team playerltligtltligtHigh attention to detailltligtltligtStrong work ethic drive and staminaltligtltligtAbility to work independently with intense and consistent focusltligtltligtStrong organization and time management skillsltligtltulgtltpgtltpgt
